mapper.select: SELECT gm.* FROM sj_practice_task pt INNER JOIN sj_groups g ON pt.ID=g.PRACTICE_ID INNER JOIN sj_group_members gm ON g.ID=gm.GROUP_ID where pt.id=#{Practice_id} and LENGTH(gm.user_id)=32
SELECT c.USER_ID from sj_practice_task a,sj_groups b,sj_group_members c where a.ID=b.PRACTICE_ID and b.ID=c.GROUP_ID and a.TEA_ID=#{tea_id} and length(c.USER_ID) = 32
select id from sj_group_members b where GROUP_ID=#{group_id} and length(b.user_id)=32
select DISTINCT(USER_ID) from sj_group_members where GROUP_ID=#{group_id} AND length(USER_ID)=32
SELECT DISTINCT(COUNT(ID)) FROM sj_group_members WHERE GROUP_ID=#{group_id} AND length(user_id)=32

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sj_group_members WHERE GROUP_ID in (SELECT id FROM sj_groups WHERE PRACTICE_ID in( SELECT ID FROM sj_practice_task WHERE SCOPE in (SELECT ID FROM sj_org WHERE PARENT_ID in (SELECT ID FROM sj_org WHERE PARENT_ID='szxy') AND ORG_LEVEL='3' UNION (SELECT ID FROM sj_org WHERE PARENT_ID='szxy' ) ) AND STATE='1' AND GRADE=#{grade} AND TASK_TYPE='1')) AND length(user_id)=32 AND STATE='1'
SELECT DISTINCT(COUNT(ID)) FROM sj_group_members WHERE GROUP_ID=#{group_id} AND length(user_id)=16

SELECT * FROM sj_student where id IN(SELECT gm.USER_ID FROM sj_practice_task pt INNER JOIN sj_groups g ON pt.ID=g.PRACTICE_ID INNER JOIN sj_group_members gm ON g.ID=gm.GROUP_ID where pt.id=#{Practice_id} and LENGTH(gm.user_id)=32) ORDER BY STU_CODE
SELECT * FROM sj_group_members where user_id = #{user_id} limit 1
